Description::en: A unique name for each set of choices
ID (name) of the specific choice, will be saved to XML
Choice label, will be displayed on screen. Allows adding a translation of choice labels, showing [language] in the interface
Allows setting a specific parent category for choice filters (cascading questions)
Notes::en: Column name is specified by user, e.g. ‘country’

Description::en: Displays choices on map as locations
